summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to emergency communications; authorizing an interlocal agreement for the implementation of the Emergency Communications Levy and the ongoing operation of the 800 MHz Emergency Radio Communications System; authorizing an amendment to the City's agreement with Motorola Communications and Electronics, Inc. with respect to the emergency communications system; creating the Emergency Communications Fund and providing for the deposit therein of proceeds from the King County Emergency Communications Levy; and making an appropriation from the Emergency Communications Fund for the purpose of the new emergency communications system.
